podcast_summary: In this episode of Blind Pledge, host Liz Flock interviews Devan, who was released from prison in May 2023 after being convicted for killing her abusive boyfriend. Devan talks about the challenges she faces during her reentry into society, including getting new IDs, finding a job, and establishing independence. She also discusses her desire to break the cycle of violence and trauma in her family and become an advocate for domestic abuse victims. Devan reflects on her past choices and expresses her determination to create a better life for herself and her daughter.
